root.name: Danbol Senki
root.description: Story Cardboard Senki is set in the future where Little Battle Experience toy robots are all the craze among kids. Too bad the Little Battle Experience got a tad bit too powerful and eventually posed a threat to kids playing, modifying, and upgrading them. Little Battle Experience production was then halted. Enter our 13 year old hero who suddenly finds an Little Battle Experience model in a toy shop.

similar_games.game: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Universe Accel/Cosmic Drive
